Text.Page:
{@LinkCreature:245#3509#Jehnsprin} at {@Rgn:45008$$Field Base Valiance} needs a little combat support. Our investigations put us in harms way, we accept that. But I'd like to mitigate the dangers all the same.

Head out there and back him up.

I'm a scientist, not a soldier. I'm not here to fight the argons, so I'd like your assistance. Most of it is simply killing things, but sometimes you'll also get to blow stuff up.

Good times.

What do you say?

Still standing, eh?

It's great to work with a soldier of your ability. Makes life so much easier!
